findings.behavioral: Extreme ad density combined with aggressive viewport manipulation and scroll hijacking
findings.content: AI-generated content with poor readability and minimal freshness indicating template recycling
findings.technical: Poor performance, high broken link ratio suggesting low maintenance
findings.layout: Aggressive ad positioning with viewport occlusion exceeding compliance thresholds
findings.gam: Impression spikes correlating with content updates, fill rate inconsistencies
findings.policy: Restricted keywords detected, multiple policy violations identified

mfaCases.recommendation: Immediate investigation required - multiple indicators of MFA activity

findings.behavioral: Moderate ad density with some viewport manipulation patterns
findings.content: Some AI-generated content indicators with moderate readability concerns
findings.technical: Acceptable performance metrics with minor technical issues
findings.layout: Ad positioning slightly aggressive but within moderate range
findings.gam: Some variance in metrics but within expected ranges

mfaCases.recommendation: Enhanced monitoring recommended with focus on content quality and ad behavior patterns

findings.behavioral: Reasonable ad density with minimal viewport manipulation
findings.content: Primarily human-authored content with high readability and freshness
findings.technical: Excellent performance and site maintenance indicators
findings.layout: Appropriate ad placement respecting user experience
findings.gam: Stable metrics consistent with publisher benchmarks
findings.policy: Full policy compliance with no violations detected

compliantCases.recommendation: Standard monitoring sufficient - site demonstrates strong compliance profile

findings.behavioral: Ad density within acceptable ranges with minimal manipulation
findings.content: High-quality, regularly updated content with strong readability
findings.technical: Strong technical foundation and regular maintenance
findings.layout: User-friendly ad placement respecting page hierarchy
findings.gam: Consistent performance metrics aligned with publisher group

compliantCases.recommendation: Routine monitoring continues - exemplary compliance standards demonstrated

mfaIndicators: High ad density + High viewport occlusion + Low readability
High AI likelihood + Low freshness + High similarity
Fill rate spikes + Impression anomalies + CTR deviation
complianceIndicators: Moderate ad density + Low viewport occlusion + High readability
Low AI likelihood + High freshness + Low similarity
No scroll jacking + No auto-refresh + User-friendly positioning
Stable metrics + Consistent performance + Policy compliance
